resources.string: Sorry, your SDCard is not existed.We can not find any space to download the update files.
There were some problems occurring when downloading.Please check your network environment.
Sorry, your current application is not existed in the update server.please ensure that you download from official website.
There were some error occured when parse the message from server.Please check your network status.
Your version is not exited in update server.Please make sure that you download from official website.
Your application is not match the application in update server.Please make sure that you download from official website.
